name: BLADE (Support Group)
description: An African American support group for the challenges of living with mental health while navigating real world challenges of everyday living—Black Lives: Advocating, Demonstrating, Elevating. This group meets via zoom on Monday: 4:00-5:00 pm. https://www.mentalhealthsf.org/events/ (Calendar)
fullDescription: An African American support group for the challenges of living with mental health while navigating real world challenges of everyday living—Black Lives: Advocating, Demonstrating, Elevating. This group meets via zoom on Monday: 4:00-5:00 pm. https://www.mentalhealthsf.org/events/ (Calendar)
whatTheyOffer: An African American support group for the challenges of living with mental health while navigating real world challenges of everyday living—Black Lives: Advocating, Demonstrating, Elevating. This group meets via zoom on Monday: 4:00-5:00 pm. https://www.mentalhealthsf.org/events/ (Calendar)
howToGetIt: Send email to peersupportservices@mentalhealthsf.org. Complete the Participant Information Form: https://mentalhealthsf.formstack.com/forms/participant_information_form and review the Client Rights and Requirement document: https://www.mentalhealthsf.org/wp-content/uploads/2023/12/Client-Rights-Requirements.pdf
address: 870 Market Street, Suite 658, San Francisco, CA, 94102
agency: Mental Health Association of San Francisco (MHASF)
